title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that both trend lines are increasing.

Two points for comparing how the trend lines of East Asia and the world are increasing by referencing data in the graph.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating the impact of hybrid seeds and chemical fertilizers on wheat farming in Africa.

Two points for explaining how hybrid seeds and chemical fertilizers impacted wheat farming in Africa.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that yields were already high in Europe, but rapidly increased in East Asia.

Two points for explaining why the Green Revolution had different impact on wheat farming in East Asia and Europe, as European farmers had long adopted these practices.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that life expectancy increases in any one of the regions shown on the graph.

Two points for explaining how life expectancy increased in one of the regions shown on the graph as a result of increased wheat yields.
